page.title: 12Hobbies
page.content: {Dancing-}We go three times a week to the Mrs. Mayfield School of Dancing,in the evenings or on Saturday morning.We learn many different styles of dancing from tap to jazz to disco to acrobatics. We perform in competitions and give concerts. If we do well we may travel as far as Derby or Skegness to take part in displays or to receive special tuition. {Well Dressing-}For a week in July each year two wells are decorated. {Hodthorpe Supertroopers-}This is the name of a marching band.We practice two evenings a week. We wear a red,white and blue uniform. The younger children play mostly the kazoo.The band enters competitions, usually at the weekend, all over Derbyshire. {BMX Riding-}The fields and lanes round Whitwell are popular with cyclists.
